text:
,Chronic Fatigue Syndrome (CFS)
What are the treatments for Chronic Fatigue Syndrome (CFS) ?,"Introduction
  
Managing chronic fatigue syndrome can be as complex as the illness itself. There is no cure, no prescription drugs have been developed specifically for CFS, and symptoms can vary a lot over time. Thus, people with CFS should closely monitor their health and let their doctor know of any changes; and doctors should regularly monitor their patients' conditions and change treatment strategie
